'Hmm...'%K%P
She was hmm-ing and ohhh-ing over\nthe pages in a manga.%K%P
'Still nothing?'%K%P
Shuri seemed to be looking something up on her phone.%K%P
'I don't even know where to start for cool names.'%K%P
'It doesn't need to be cool. \nJust come up with something cute.'%K%P
'Cute? No way, we should definitely go for cool.'%K%P
'With an adorable face like that? No way.'%K%P
'Huh? Are you saying I'm cute?'%K%P
'Second place after me, yeah.'%K%P
'Oh, REALLY now?!'%K%P
They looked ready to fight it out if I let them be.%K%P
But I finally started to understand that\nthis just is how they get along.%K%P
'Yamato, are you really okay\ndoing all the editing alone?'%K%P
'Yeah, no sweat.\nI'd say 'Leave it all to me!' but...'%K%P
I gestured for them to take a look at the screen.%K%P
'Do you think you two could give me some input here? \nI've always just edited these in my own style, but\nthis is your duo, so I'd like your advice.'%K%P
'Good point! This video is going to be something\nspecial for us, so I'd like to have a say.'%K%P
'I don't really have a sense for this kind of stuff,\nso maybe you two should just take care of it...'%K%P
'Come on, you don't have to do everything. \nJust take a look and tell us what you think.'%K%P
She shuffled on over, \nmaking it clear that she really didn't want to.%K%P
'Cool, so this is what video\nediting software is like, huh.'%K%P
She must have thought the screen\nlooked pretty cool because her eyes lit up.%K%P
'Okay, so we've got this here,\nor this other one. What do you think?'%K%P
'The first one! That one is CLEARLY better!'%K%P
'Wait, but if we use this one, then...'%K%P
Kagura takes the lead and gives her opinion. \nMeanwhile Shuri grimaces at everything she says.%K%P
'Okay, enough of that, my turn now. If you let her\ndecide this whole thing is gonna be a mess.'%K%P
'Wha! Hey now! \nI'm not fooling around, here!'%K%P
'Maybe not, but you're still trying to include\npanty shots, same as always.'%K%P
'You never learn, do you? \nI keep telling you we need to curb the sex appeal.'%K%P
'But come on, just a little?'%K%P
'Follow Sara's example.'%K%P
'Ah, okay, so the pure and innocent sex appeal!'%K%P
'Can we just leave that last part out, seriously?'%K%P
I thought I'd just be editing away quietly by myself,\n but it turned out to be quite an affair.%K%P
This was a first for me too,\nso it was actually pretty fun.%K%P
'I thought coming up with a name would take a while,\nbut editing sure does take some time too, huh.'%K%P
'Yeah, this thing probably won't\nbe ready till late tonight.'%K%P
'Let's make this a sleepover, then!'%K%P
'That's fine by me, but don't you two\nneed to get home?'%K%P
'I just live by myself anyway, so it's no big deal.'%K%P
'No problem here, either! \nWow, this is kind of exciting!'%K%P
'Yeah, it's like we're REALLY a duo now,\nthis is nice.'%K%P
I had thought Shuri wouldn't like the idea,\nbut she seemed down for it.%K%P
She has changed a bit herself,\nover the course of our activities.%K%P
'Well if you're down, let's get this thing finished.'%K%P
'Hooray! Sleepover time!'%K%P
'Okay okay, let's have our fun, sure,\nbut don't forget why we're here.'%K%P
'I know, I know! But come on, enjoy yourself a bit! \nLet go a bit!'%K%P
'You know I can't compete with you...\nBut I AM having fun, you know.'%K%P
She seemed almost embarrassed admitting it.%K%P
But she did look like she was enjoying herself.%K%P
'Alright, I'll go tell my parents. I'll get the\nblankets and stuff, but what about a change\nof clothes?'%K%P
'Let's borrow Yamato's!'%K%P
'Uhh, no thanks.'%K%P
We continued editing after dinner.%K%P
The two of them seemed pretty tired,\nbut they still hung by and gave advice.%K%P
'Hmmm, so... What about that name?'%K%P
'I can give you some roundabout ideas,\nbut I've got nothing that really stands out.'%K%P
'Maybe we should just take the best parts of each,\nand kind of piece them all together.'%K%P
'Uhh, I can't see that working out.'%K%P
'Yeah, I'm with Shuri on that one.'%K%P
'What? Really?'%K%P
'I doubt that would work with all three of us. \nMaybe just the two of you, tops.'%K%P
'Are you trying to back out?'%K%P
'After all this? Of course not. \nI'm still helping out here.'%K%P
Our mid-edit video looped again and again.%K%P
At one point the two of them held hands. \nAnd when they do there's this star effect.%K%P
'Okay. I'll be the star that connects you two, \nso throw in a ☆ for my part.'%K%P
'Are you trying to be cool or something?'%K%P
'Wait, but that could be a good idea. \n You and I can each come up with an idea,\nand Yamato's ☆ can join them together.'%K%P
'That might work. \nIt would at least keep it from getting too crazy.'%K%P
'Sounds like a plan, then! \nAlright, get ready for it.'%K%P
'Don't go too overboard, okay? \nI'll try to pick something that matches.'%K%P
'Sorry, Shuri. Didn't mean to drop this all on you.'%K%P
'Nah, it's fine. Working with her,\nI expected this from the start.'%K%P
'That's what a partner is for, right? \nKagura can pull off that sort of charm I don't have,\nand I can make up for what she doesn't have.'%K%P
'And then there's you in the middle,\nconnecting us both.'%K%P
'It's kind of embarrassing to hear face-to-face.'%K%P
'But you should be aware of it. \nOf how you keep us together.'%K%P
'I know. As long as you two keep going,\nI'll be your middle star.'%K%P
'Good. \nOkay you two, give me your hands.'%K%P
She called out to us.%K%P
We each put out a hand, all holding hands in silence.%K%P
'This is our new beginning. You ready?'%K%P
'Let's do this, all three of us.'%K%P
'The two of you can do it. \nI'm ready to bring you two to the top.'%K%P
'We're counting on you, Mr. shooting star.'%K%P
'Good luck.\nJust remember, I'll pay you back any time.'%K%P
Holding hands together like that,\nit felt like a night I would never forget.%K%P
There was no telling\nwhere these two goddesses would climb to.%K%P
But I was simply thankful,\njust for the chance to be with them both.%K%P
Shuri and Kagura weren't going to stop here. \nI knew it, somewhere deep down inside of me.%K%P
They were set on the right path,\nand it was just a matter of moving forward.%K%P
As the night drove on and my family had all gone\nto bed, I was starting to feel drained from working.%K%P
'I think I'm gonna go take a shower.'%K%P
I felt bad for being all sweaty\nand smelly around them.%K%P
It would be a good refresher, too.%K%P
'W-What are you doing in here?!'%K%P
Just as I had stripped down and turned the water on\nKagura came barging in.%K%P
'I said I'd pay you back, right?'%K%P
'So, this is how you're thanking me...?'%K%P
'Well, I for one think that there'd be nothing\ngreater than getting a back scrub from a goddess.'%K%P
*Scrub-a-dub-dub*%K%P
Kagura squeezed out some soap\nand started scrubbing my back without a word.%K%P
'Well, how is it?'%K%P
'I... It's... I don't know.'%K%P
'Hmm? Not enjoying ourselves, are we?'%K%P
To be honest, I could hardly even focus.%K%P
It would have been fine if she at least covered\nup with a towel or something, but there she was\nin all her glory.%K%P
'Wait, are you checking me out?'%K%P
'Like I can help it.\nWhen a girl just shows up nude like that...'%K%P
'A 'girl'? I'm a goddess, you know.'%K%P
'Yeah, sure, but you're still a girl, too. \nSo I'll keep treating you like a girl.'%K%P
'Hmm, is that so? \nHeheh, you know, I think I kind of like that.'%K%P
She seemed happy to just be another girl.%K%P
She hummed a little song while\nhappily scrubbing me down.%K%P
'Well then, if you're gonna treat me like a girl,\nthen I'm gonna speak to you like a girl.'%K%P
'Thanks for everything. \nAnd here's to our future!'%K%P
Her fingers ran down my back.%K%P
It suddenly felt like something more\nthan just a simple wash-down.%K%P
'I should thank you. \nIt's been fun working with you two.'%K%P
'I hope we can make it through the preliminaries.'%K%P
'You can. You guys are unstoppable now.'%K%P
I wasn't lying, I really did think they could do it.%K%P
They had this power\nand I could see them going far.%K%P
'It's not just us, you're part of the group, too.'%K%P
She counted it out, one, two, three. \nThree of her fingers ran down my back.%K%P
'I hope we all stick together forever!'%K%P
'Yeah.'%K%P
Their duo unit was just for the preliminaries.%K%P
If they made it to the main audition,\nKagura and Shuri would have to compete\nagainst each other.%K%P
But I still felt like the three of us\nwould be fine anyway.%K%P
'Hehe...'%K%P
I'm sure she felt the same way.%K%P
*Yaaaawn*%K%P
She let out a big yawn. \nIt seemed to pass to Shuri, who yawned next.%K%P
It was already well past midnight. \nOf course we were all tired.%K%P
'Would you mind if I just took a quick nap?'%K%P
'I'm so tired...'%K%P
'Your beds are laid out in the next room,\nso feel free.'%K%P
'Thanks. Why don't you catch a bit of sleep, too?'%K%P
'I will, at some point.'%K%P
After another hour of editing I couldn't fight\nit anymore and headed off to sleep.%K%P
I set my alarm to go off in two hours.%K%P
It was only a fraction of a second\nuntil I was fast asleep.%K%P
'Nghh, hey sis...'%K%P
Some strange sensation pulls me out of my slumber.%K%P
'I'm so coooold.'%K%P
*Hug*%K%P
'Ngh?!'%K%P
I was so surprised by what happened\nthat I couldn't even form words.%K%P
When I opened my eyes Shuri was latched on to me.%K%P
'What's going on here?'%K%P
I had no idea what had happened.%K%P
'I love you, sis...'%K%P
I had never heard her talk like this before.%K%P
It was like she was a little child,\nlatched right on to me.%K%P
Not the kind of thing a young man can handle calmly!%K%P
'Mmm... mhmm...'%K%P
It seemed like she was still half asleep.%K%P
She had been sleeping next to me,\nbut must have rolled over in the night.%K%P
That in and of itself was fine, though. \nThe problem was something else entirely.%K%P
'What happened to your pajamas?'%K%P
She should have had more than her panties to wear.%K%P
They might not have been brand new,\nbut I had left out a pair of sweats for her.%K%P
Did she really hate wearing other people's things\nTHAT much...?%K%P
'Hey sis...'%K%P
She was as defenseless as could be.%K%P
She was latched on to me with both arms and legs,\nher breasts pressed against me.%K%P
Was she a regular pillow hugger, or did she just have\na habit of latching onto things? \nEither way this was quite the predicament.%K%P
I wasn't sure I (or certain parts of me) could\ntake much more!%K%P
I had no choice but to pretend to be asleep.%K%P
I just had to wait for her to wake up\nand leave on her own.%K%P
It was the perfect plan! I pictured it all playing\nout in my head, but in that very instant it all\ncame crashing down.%K%P
'Shoot! I forgot the alarm!'%K%P
'...Bwah?'%K%P
Checkmate.%K%P
'Aaaaaaaaaaah!!!'%K%P
'Hey! What's going on here?!'%K%P
'No, wait! It's not what you think!'%K%P
'You creep!!'%K%P
She started throwing everything\naround her at me in a panic.%K%P
I threw up my blanket to block her,\nand waited for her rage to pass.%K%P
'Jeez, be quiet you two. \nIs there a fire or something? An earthquake?'%K%P
Kagura came over to see what the fuss was about.%K%P
'Wait, Kagura...'%K%P
'Wow Shuri, you can be bold sometimes!'%K%P
'N-No! It's not like that! This is just...!'%K%P
'I'm not gonna be left out!'%K%P
*Rustle* Kagura quickly stripped down, too.%K%P
Things had really gotten out of hand.%K%P
'I'm not bad at this sort of thing either,\nyou know! Hrngh!'%K%P
'Bwha?!'%K%P
Now scantily clad, Kagura dove for me.%K%P
'Hey, what are you doing!'%K%P
'Come on, Shuri!'%K%P
Shuri tried to stop her, but Kagura pulled her in.%K%P
Both of them fell down on top of me.%K%P
'Your breasts are so soft, Shuri!'%K%P
'Huh?! Watch where you put those hands! Aaahn!'%K%P
What on earth was I supposed to do?%K%P
All I could do was muster all my strength\nto keep things from getting even more awkward.%K%P
